name: Purchase Equipment
description: Purchase the mandatory equipment for your shop and office.

name: First Order
description: Order your first batch of jewelry from a supplier.

name: Setup Showcase
description: Place at least one item in your showcase to attract customers.

name: Craft Your First Ring
description: Go to your workshop and craft your very first item: a simple ring.

name: Sell a Crafted Item
description: Sell an item that you have crafted yourself.

name: Artin's Test: The Classic Band
description: Usta Artin wants to test your basic skills. Craft a ring using the 'D-Profile Classic' shank.

name: Izzy's Challenge: Modern Minimalism
description: Izzy wants to see your design sense. Craft any piece of jewelry that has both 'Modern' and 'Minimal' style tags.

name: A Touch of Sparkle
description: After researching 'Basic Stone Setting', craft your first piece of jewelry that includes a gemstone.
